biography: Olli, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his meticulous approach to the game and unwavering dedication to emulating his idol, Bryson. A proud member of Hirsala Golf, Olli brings a blend of technical prowess and raw enthusiasm to the competition.

With 8 past appearances, Olli's experience is undeniable. His singular victory in the Hector Trophée stands as a testament to his skill and composure under pressure. Beyond team success, Olli has also distinguished himself as an exceptional individual player, having claimed the Victor Trophy once.

As he prepares for his ninth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, Olli remains a formidable competitor, driven by a desire to add to his already impressive record and inspire his teammates with his unwavering spirit.
